name: Serendip
description:
We believe meeting new people and creating meaningful connections is what gives colour and inspiration to life.

Today we are living in the most connected time in human history, yet an unprecedented number of us feel isolated.

Serendip meaningfully connects you with new people, who share and resonate with your core values.

team.name: Kunal Shah
team.bioHtml: Co-Founder & CTO @Serendip | Technical Operations Consultant | Computer Science Graduate

team.name: Ronak Shah
team.bioHtml: Co-Founder & CEO @Serendip • Mathematician on a mission to end loneliness worldwide • Former Trader @Citigroup

jobs.title: Software Engineering Intern
jobs.description:
Join our mission to end loneliness worldwide.

As a Software Engineering Intern, you would help develop Serendip's iOS and Android mobile app. Familiarity with JavaScript, React Native, Node.js and Firebase is preferable or a willingness to learn. (To start in May 2020).
